About.title: 1Globalization of Korean culture
About.content: Korean content has begun to be popular around the world. As many foreigners began to be interested in dramas, movies, and kpop, they began to be interested in Korean culture.

Foods.keywords: gimbap, lunchbox, main dish, non spicy, rice, snack
Foods.ingredients: cooking oil, garlic scapes, honey, rice syrup, shredded red pepper, soy sauce, sugar, toasted sesame oil, toasted sesame seeds
Foods.info: Whenever the season changes, I always love to see the fresh, new ingredients available at the farmers’ market and the Korean grocery store. I love to cook with these ingredients, and I love to eat them, but I’m sometimes not sure if I should use them in my recipe videos, because they might be unfamiliar to a lot of people.
